beta_warning.title: Beta System
beta_warning.description: The Subs system is in active development. It may contain bugs and some features are being improved.

subs.explore_description: Discover communities by topic of interest and join the conversations
subs.search_placeholder: Search subs by name or description...
subs.no_subs_found: No subs found matching your criteria
subs.confirm_leave: Are you sure you want to leave {name}?
subs.confirm_leave_owner: Are you sure you want to leave {name}? As the owner, the sub will become orphaned and any member can claim ownership. Moderators have priority to claim.
subs.join_login_required: Please log in to join communities
subs.create_login_required: Please log in to create communities
subs.create_title: Want to create your own sub?
subs.create_description: Create a new community for topics you're passionate about
subs.requirements_not_met: You don't meet the requirements to create a sub
subs.requirements_description: To create a sub you need to meet the following requirements:
subs.requirement_age: Account must be at least 30 days old
subs.requirement_age_remaining: Your account must be at least {days} days old. {remaining} days remaining.
subs.error_fetching: Error fetching subs. Please try again.
subs.error_fetching_sub: Error fetching sub details. Please try again.
subs.creator: Creator
subs.no_posts: No posts in this community yet. Be the first to post!
subs.join_request_sent: Your request to join has been sent
subs.join_request_pending: Your request to join is pending approval
subs.private_community_description: You need to join this community to view its content
subs.name_requirements: Only letters, numbers, underscores and hyphens allowed. 3-25 characters.
subs.name_too_short: Name must be at least 3 characters long
subs.name_too_long: Name cannot be longer than 25 characters
subs.name_invalid_chars: Only letters (no accents), numbers, hyphens (-) and underscores (_) are allowed
subs.title: Title
subs.description_placeholder: A community for developers to share knowledge, ask questions, and discuss programming topics.
subs.icon_description: Select an emoji that represents your community
subs.public_description: Anyone can view and join this community
subs.approval_description: New members must be approved by moderators
subs.rules_description: Set guidelines to help maintain a healthy community
subs.rule_description_placeholder: Treat all members with respect and courtesy
subs.my_subs_description: Posts from subs you're subscribed to
subs.select_sub_hint: If you select a community you're not subscribed to, you'll be subscribed automatically
subs.will_subscribe_on_submit: You will be subscribed to this sub when you submit
subs.no_subscriptions_title: You're not subscribed to any subs
subs.no_subscriptions_description: Subs are specialized spaces within {siteName} where you can follow specific topics. Explore available communities and join the ones that interest you.
subs.sub_not_found_description: This community doesn't exist yet. Do you want to create it?
subs.approval_not_required: This sub doesn't require post approval
subs.settings_content_types_description: Select what types of content can be posted in this sub
subs.settings_not_authorized_description: Only the creator of this community can modify its settings
subs.is_private_description: Only members can see the content of this community
subs.require_approval_description: Posts must be approved by moderators before being published
subs.allow_nsfw_description: Allow adult content (+18) to be posted
subs.confirm_remove_member: Are you sure you want to remove {username} from this community?
subs.request_join_description: s/{name} is a private community. Send a request to join.
subs.request_message_placeholder: Tell us why you'd like to join this community...
subs.request_sent_success: Your request has been sent. You'll receive a notification when it's reviewed.
subs.icon_requirements: JPG, PNG, GIF or WebP. Max 16MB.
subs.moderators_description: Moderators can approve posts, manage members, and hide content
subs.no_moderators: You are the only moderator of this sub
subs.add_moderator_description: Select a member to make them a moderator
subs.confirm_remove_moderator: Are you sure you want to remove {username} as moderator?
subs.already_moderator: This user is already a moderator
subs.must_be_member_to_moderate: User must be a member of the sub to become a moderator
subs.hidden_posts_description: Posts that have been hidden by moderators
subs.hide_reason_placeholder: Explain why you're hiding this post...
subs.orphaned_sub_description: The original owner has abandoned this sub. You can claim ownership if you meet the requirements.
subs.claim_ownership_description: By claiming ownership, you will become the new owner of this sub and will be able to manage its settings.
subs.claim_success: You have successfully claimed ownership of this sub
subs.moderators_have_priority: Moderators have priority to claim this sub
subs.cannot_claim: You cannot claim this sub. You must be a member to claim it.
subs.not_orphaned: This sub has an active owner
subs.waiting_for_moderators: There are active moderators who have priority to claim this sub
subs.hide_owner_description: The owner will not be publicly visible on the sub page
subs.hide_moderators_description: Moderators will not be publicly visible on the sub page
subs.fediverse_follow_description: Follow this sub from Mastodon, Lemmy or other federated networks
